description._content: Returns the list of people who have favorited a given photo.

response._content:
<photo id="1253576" secret="81b96be690" server="1" farm="1"
	page="1" pages="3" perpage="10" total="27">
	<person nsid="33939862@N00" username="Dementation" favedate="1166689690"/>
	<person nsid="49485425@N00" username="indigenous_prodigy" favedate="1166573724"/>
	<person nsid="46834205@N00" username="smaaz" favedate="1161874052"/>

	<person nsid="44991966@N00" username="getnoid" favedate="1159828789"/>
	<person nsid="92544710@N00" username="miss_rogue" favedate="1158034266"/>

argument.name: api_key
argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.

argument.name: photo_id
argument._content: The ID of the photo to fetch the favoriters list for.

argument.name: page
argument._content: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.

argument.name: per_page
argument._content: Number of usres to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 10. The maximum allowed value is 50.

error._content: The specified photo does not exist, or the calling user does not have permission to view it.
The API key passed was not valid or has expired.

The XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
One or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
